narratives: At the market, you can buy and sell seeds in exchange for gold.
The action [do buySeeds] allows you to purchase 1 unit of seed from the market.
Enter [Task] [Action] to buy seeds from the market.~
feedback: You have succesfully bought seeds using the gold you have
Note that a symbol '->'  will appear whenever there is a change in your assets,
objective: Buy some seeds from the market
hint:
1.Enter [market] to check the price of a seed.
2.Enter [do buySeeds] to buy seeds from the market if you can afford it.
